entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 then northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
